storeInfo.title: Ghost eShop Alternative DS
storeInfo.author: Ghost eShop Team
storeInfo.description:
An free eShop for DS games
Version of the eShop: v13.0

Author: Ghost eShop Team
Special thanks: Dark98

info.title: 007 - Blood Stone
info.author: Activision
info.description: Action game. Full of gunfights and boat and car chases, the adventure here takes us to the four corners of the world to stop a terrorist threat. There is also a multiplayer mode for four budding spies.

info.title: 007 - Quantum of Solace
info.author: Activision
info.description: New episode of the James Bond saga, Quantum of Solace allows you to play as the most famous secret agent on Nintendo DS.

info.title: 1 vs 100
info.author: Destination Software, KSS
info.description: 1 vs. 100 for the Nintendo DS recreates the fun of the hit TV show, while 4 additional game modes bring on new and competitive excitement.

info.title: 100 All-Time Favorites
info.author: Ubisoft
info.description: 100 All-Time Favorites is a mini-game collection. It is a simple collection of board, card, and other variety of games. Despite the name, it does not come with 100 unique games.

info.title: 100 Classic Books
info.author: Nintendo
info.description: 100 Classic Book Collection, is an e-book collection. The game includes one hundred public domain works of literature.

info.title: 1001 Touch Games
info.author: Maximum Family
info.description: 1001 Touch Games features the largest collection of “pick-up-and-play” arcade games available! Choose from hidden object scenes, matching games, strategy games,...

info.title: 101 in 1 Explosive Megamix
info.author: Atlus
info.description: Players can use the stylus and touch screen to test their reflexes in action minigames like racing and skydiving, take on sporting events such as basketball, curling, and archery.

info.title: 101 in 1 Sports Megamix
info.author: Atlus
info.description: 101 in 1: Sports Megamix is a compilation of games for DS. This compilation offers many events (101 to be exact) that combine reflexes and coordination. Bowling, boxing, tennis, basketball or even horse riding.

info.title: 123 Sesame Street - Cookie's Counting Carnival - The Videogame
info.author: WB Games, Inc.
info.description: There are twelve game modes to play, as well as fourteen minigames.

info.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup - Germany 2006
info.author: Electronic Arts
info.description: The game contains 127 playable teams. Despite licensing issues between EA and the national football associations of Japan and the Netherlands, the two teams are fully licensed with real names and kits.

info.title: 2-Pack - Pinkalicious - It's Party Time! & Silverlicious - Sweet Adventure
info.description: This double pack has two games combined on one cartridge: Pinkalicious: It's Party Time Silverlicious: Sweet Adventure.

info.title: 7 Wonders II
info.author: MumboJumbo
info.description: In this puzzle game, you have to build the 7 Wonders of the World with the help of little Egyptians who are ready to do anything to help you in your task. You have to align a series of runes to build the wonders of our world. Each wonder has 6 or 7 levels of difficulty.

info.title: 7 Wonders of the Ancient World
info.author: MumboJumbo
info.description: Players take the task of reconstructing the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. In each wonder, there are 5 to 7 sub-levels of runes that players switch to form a row of 3 or more runes. There are two modes of play: Free Play and Quest Modes.

script.output: sdmc:/_nds/TWiLightMenu/boxart/7 Wonders of the Ancient World (USA).nds.png

info.title: Mario Kart Ds Deluxe
info.author: Rafa4K
info.description:
Mario kart Ds Deluxe is a rom hack for DS working with Twilight and r4.
In this game there are modded tracks and tracks from Mario kart 8 Deluxe !
